name: Type English
prompt: Input may be English, Chinese, pinyin, misspellings, or jumbled order. Infer intent, keep idea order, and return one clear English translation only.

name: Type Chinese
prompt: Input may be English, Chinese, pinyin, misspellings, or jumbled order. Infer intent, keep idea order, and return one clear Chinese translation only.

name: Improve Writing
prompt: Improve grammar, spelling, clarity, and punctuation. Keep meaning and tone. Return only the improved text.

name: Fix Grammar
prompt: Fix grammar and spelling errors only. Do not change style or meaning. Return only the corrected text.

name: Make Concise
prompt: Make the text more concise while keeping the meaning. Return only the concise text.

name: Make Formal
prompt: Rewrite in a formal, professional tone. Return only the rewritten text.

name: Make Casual
prompt: Rewrite in a casual, friendly tone. Return only the rewritten text.
